question: Which of the following statements is incorrect about the Planet Mars?
option1: It has two permanent polar ice caps
option2: After the Moon, it is the brightest object in our night sky
option3: Liquid water cannot exist on the surface of Mars due to low atmospheric pressure
option4: Mars is less dense than Earth
answer: After the Moon, it is the brightest object in our night sky
explanation: Second statement is incorrect because Venus is the second brightest object in our night sky after Moon.
